projects.name: World of Warcraft - GroupFinder
projects.description: Twitch-Streamer and Players are able to use this tool to set up lists and find partners for their dungeons and events.

projects.name: Twitch Clip Downloader
projects.description: Downloads multiple Twitch-Clips based on many different options.

projects.name: return-null
projects.description: Starting Projects we won't finish. This E-Book targets the process of starting projects we will be stuck with in our entire career.

projects.name: Steam Deal Crawler
projects.description:
This nodeJs-Bot is a simple crawler to search through a specific Tag you always wanted to have.
This node-js crawler searches through a tag-name and lists every discount with percentage and price. The export of the result is on your side.

projects.name: Random Trello-Card Picker
projects.description: Pick a random card out of your Trello-Boards to work on some random projects.

projects.name: Discord Embed Generator
projects.description: Generate some simple embeds to test your discord-webhooks.

projects.name: League of Antitilt
projects.description: Just a little Troll-App to notify yourself after the game startet to 'mute them all'!

projects.name: wshbr-theme
projects.description: This is the repository for the main-design for the german news-website https://wshbr.de/

projects.name: wshbr-wordpress-themoviedb-sidebar
projects.description: A simple wordpress plugin to grab information for a movie or series from https://www.themoviedb.org into a sidebar

projects.name: wshbr-share-to-discord
projects.description: A simple wordpress plugin to share your posts with your discord-servers.

projects.name: wshbr-review
projects.description: A wordpress plugin to hook a simple review form to your posts

projects.name: wshbr-spoiler
projects.description: A Wordpress-Plugin to add a "Spoiler" overlay on thumbnails

projects.name: wshbr-featured-slider
projects.description: A simple wordpress plugin to hook a picture to your posts and use it on a configurable slider in your Theme.

projects.name: discourse-humble-box
projects.description: This plugin for Discourse uses the discourse-api to decorate the cooked-posts. Primary usage is for properly embedding Humblebundle.com-Links in Discourse posts and parsing them into better looking iframes.

projects.name: discourse-anime-manga-box
projects.description: This plugin for Discourse uses the discourse-api to decorate the cooked-posts. Primary usage is for properly embedding Anime- and Manga-Links in Discourse posts and parsing them into better looking iframes.

projects.name: psn-store-scraper
projects.description: Retrieve meta-data from the PlayStation-Network store for Objects (Games, DLCs etc)
